text: Clint Chapman (born March 6, 1989) is an American professional basketball player who last played for Victoria Libertas Pesaro in the Italian Lega Basket Serie A (LBA). Won multiple international basketball accolades in several countries worldwide. Over the course of 8 seasons, 2012 to 2020, competed in more than 300 international basketball games. Played in over a dozen countries worldwide from Europe to Asia.
